description: Welcome to this beautifully updated 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom townhome with approximately 1,700 sq. ft. of bright, spacious living in a sought-after Queensboro location. Extensive upgrades include a remodeled kitchen with custom cabinetry and granite countertops, updated laminate and tile flooring, fresh paint, and custom dining room storage. Bathrooms feature a renovated full bath and updated ensuite with new fixtures, vanities, and shower door. Additional improvements include a his-and-hers primary closet, recessed lighting, new appliances, hot water tank, and a brand-new roof. Close to Costco, Walmart, shopping, and transit, this move-in-ready home offers modern upgrades and a prime location.
